title: 45 Best Online Furniture Stores for Every Interior Style (2025)
description: Your AD-approved guide on where to buy it all
author: Nashia Baker, Lori Keong
excerpt: Looking for the best online furniture stores? These 45 sites are standout options for where to buy furniture online. Discover affordable pieces you’ll love!
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.The best online furniture stores have a few things in common: a well-curated selection of items, decent enough shipping timelines to get you that sectional sofa right on schedule, and of course enough style to round out your home without dragging down your decor scheme. So many newer D2C players have entered the flatpacking arena, though, that we thought we’d pull together a list of the all-time greats and all of our newer faves for furniture that are here for a long time (not just for the duration of your current rental).One of our editors’ favorite pastimes is scrolling through pages and pages of credenzas and tables galore [gestures wildly to all the categories on our shopping site] so naturally we're happy to fill you in on what's worth the browse, what actually ships out fast (and occasionally free), plus what our editors own from the stores mentioned below. Household names like West Elm, IKEA, and Crate & Barrel are no-brainers on the list, but others, like Hem and Sabai, are also great smaller businesses to add to your search. Read on and discover the best online furniture stores that all come AD-approved, plus be sure to check out our favorite lighting and outdoor furniture destinations, too.The Best Online Furniture Brands, According to AD:Best Online-Only Furniture Brand: ArticleBest Minimalist Furniture Brand: CastleryBest Budget Furniture Brand: WayfairBest Splurge-Worthy Furniture Brand: ArhausBest Coastal-Inspired Furniture Brand: Serena & LilyBest Bohemian-Style Furniture Brand: AnthropologieArticleArticle Nordby Sleeper SofaArticle Muhly Oak SideboardWho needs a brick-and-mortar store when you can be shipping out all kinds of midcentury-inspired designs right to people’s doorsteps? That’s the thinking behind Article, one of our favorite online-only design destinations for affordable-ish furniture (think woven sofas draped in performance fabric and chubby-legged credenzas and tables). The Nordby sleeper sofa in particular is one of our editors’ favorites for its minimalist lines and down-to-earth design.Great for modern design enthusiasts and outdoor furniture offerings$49 flat-rate Front Door Delivery fee for larger items that can’t be shipped by courier$19 fee for smaller items or those under $200 via courier$199 in-room delivery and assembly serviceCastleryCastlery Harper Lift-Top Coffee TableCastlery Jonathan Chaise Sectional SofaCastlery is a one-stop shop for tasteful high-low goods, with pieces of furniture organized by room and easily filtered by price point, material, color, size, and more so you can easily find what you need. There's a huge selection of classic, contemporary, and midcentury-modern pieces online and even a virtual showroom that lets you “wander” through their IRL warehouse. Castlery will even send out three free swatches for any product you’re interested in and has a 14-day return policy in case you're not in love with what you’ve just set up in your space. We’ve personally tested the Jonathan sofa seen here and the Ingrid arm chair ourselves in case you need a preview of what’s worth shopping. Both have received glowing reviews from staffers and contributors.Frequent sales, mid-century modern designs, free swatches availableFlat fee varies based on locationWayfairBrayden Studio Allrich Cloud Coffee TableJoss & Main Amala Upholstered SofaWayfair’s reputation as a budget home goods destination precedes itself—the brand rivals Amazon in terms of inventory, but it specializes in furniture in particular. We’ve tested dozens of furniture and decor items from sleeper sofas to sectionals to office chairs and floating shelves, so we have a good sense of what feels a lot more luxury than the price tag would suggest. And if you want to hold out for a particularly good deal, the brand’s annual Way Day sale, which unfurls discounts on thousands of items and a bunch of flash sales, is not to be missed either.Affordable retailer, frequent sales, home to a variety of furniture design styles and everything else you might need (appliances, tech goods, etc.)Furniture assembly is available by Angi and Wayfair Home Services, but customers must move the product to the desired assembly location since the professionals are not responsible for moving the productFree Shipping over $35 and $4.99 flat-rate shipping for orders under $35ArhausArhaus Kipton SofaArhaus Wolfe ChairArhaus (German for house) offers high-end, heirloom-quality furniture for every room of the house, plus plenty of artisanal decor and lighting options online and in its brick-and-mortar stores around the country. The Kipton sofa seen here, with its easy silhouette and seemingly endless customization options, is another AD favorite.Heirloom-quality furniture, sustainably made pieces, white glove delivery serviceWhite glove delivery: $299 local delivery, $399 extended delivery areas, and $399 to $599 (depending on your location) national delivery (excluding Alaska and Hawaii).Package Carrier Delivery Rates: Between $9 and $160 for standard delivery, between $59 and $210 for expedited delivery, and between $84 and $235 for express deliverySerena & LilySerena & Lily Beach House Wide ChaiseSerena & Lily Scallop Side TableSerena & Lily channels calm, coastal vibes for your beach house or back porch, featuring lots of wicker and nautical blues and whites. Shop the brand’s collection for deep couches, statement-making end tables, expansive coffee tables, unique console tables, hand-knotted area rugs, striking outdoor dining sets, and so much more.Sales throughout the year, abundance of outdoor furniture to choose from, offers an interior design serviceMight not fit a variety of home design styles like traditionalFedex: small ($19), medium ($49), and large ($149) deliveries in contiguous U.S.Fedex: small ($49), medium ($99), and large ( $449) deliveries in Alaska and HawaiiHome delivery: Between $149 and $299 for doorstep delivery up to 151+ miles, between $199 and $399 for room of choice delivery, between $299 and $599 for white glove deliveryAnthropologieAnthropologie Havana Leather ChairFern Storage CabinetAnthropologie’s furniture selection is a colorful extension of their clothing collection, and every time a new collection rolls out, it’s almost guaranteed we see something we love. Packed with personality and bohemian flair, the designs—like the Havana leather chair we reviewed during Seat Week—are not for wallflowers. “I envision this chair in a modern Boho-style space imbued with warm hues, eclectic textures, and a cozy atmosphere," says Livia Caligor, AD’s U.S. content operations manager in her review. And though pieces tend to fall in the splurge-worthy category, sales happen fairly regularly for scoring deals.Bold furniture design, contemporary stylesLimited stock for some furniture piecesBetween $6.95 and $15.95 or free ship on $50+ orders for standard shipping, add $10 for express shipping, add $15 for overnight shippingPottery BarnPottery Barn Surrey SofaCayman Platform Bed and HeadboardThis mainstay is a household name for a reason. Based in San Francisco and part of the Williams-Sonoma portfolio (alongside West Elm and Rejuvenation), there are many locations you can shop in-store around the world. Pottery Barn also stocks a huge online selection that puts their collections at your fingertips no matter where you are. Their high-quality furniture ranges from classic to contemporary—and, after nearly a century in business, they’re prioritizing sustainability with initiatives centered on responsibly sourced wood and cotton and recycled fabrics.Huge furniture selection, multiple design styles to shop, sustainably made furnitureSome customers might find the furniture designs more genericBetween $5.95 and 10% + $26 for standard and next-day shipping, between $159 and $429 for local and national white glove deliveryAmazonLaura Davidson Furniture Padded Office ChairRane FutonYou already know Amazon has everything under the sun, but did you know that it includes budget-friendly furniture for all rooms of the home, complete with free delivery? The myriad filtering options help you find exactly what you’re looking for, whether that’s a down comforter, a small-space humidifier, or a housewarming gift. Amazon is also the exclusive retailer for a few different decor brands at affordable prices, including Rivet, Stone & Beam, Christopher Knight Home, and Now House by Jonathan Adler, but you can also surface modern brands like Yamazaki Home and Umbra there, too.Affordable furniture options, free, quick shipping with Prime membershipWhile Amazon has a premium home storefront, quality varies among its third-party and lesser-known sellers and warranties are harder to come byFree with Prime membershipWest ElmMarcus Samuelsson Dining Table by West ElmWest Elm Laurent Chaise SectionalBrooklyn-based retailer West Elm, a Williams-Sonoma brand, is a popular choice for modern design picks of all stripes for city dwellers and beyond, but that’s only part of the store’s appeal. West Elm also sells lots of organic, handcrafted, sustainably sourced, and Fair Trade Certified items among its decor and linens. Sales abound if you’re eyeing something in particular, and you can take a baseline 15% off when you sign up for their emails.Handmade offerings, sustainably sourced home goods, affordable optionsSome customers might find the quality less high-end than other boutique furniture stores on this listRove ConceptsRove Concepts Gallus Coffee TableRove Concepts Reya Curved SectionalRove Concepts is the place to shop if you’re looking to mimic the effortlessly chic vibes of your favorite celebrity’s home. The furniture sets in particular are worth checking out if you experience decision fatigue and want the same sleek look all-around.Contemporary, Scandinavian designs, clean lines, timeless aestheticItems only ship to the USA and Canada, except for Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico and Nunavut$159 for all orders up to $5,000 in valueInterior DefineInterior Define Rowan Accent ChairInterior Define Lennox LoveseatInterior Define is a retailer that has never seen a rich fabric swatch it didn’t love, and has become known for its infinitely customizable, well-designed staples that will last for years without breaking down in quality. Not only can you personalize the color of each piece, but you can also easily select other options such as fill, furniture legs, cushion style, and more, all from their website or brick-and-mortar shops in select cities. In addition to furniture, they also sell a solid selection of rugs and lighting to polish off a space.All items are made to order, neutral furniture essentialsPricier delivery fee for upholstered furnitureBetween $14 and $279 for standard shippingCrate & BarrelHugger Curved Boucle Apartment Sofa by Leanne FordCeremonie Green Mohair Dining Chair by Athena CalderoneCrate & Barrel may be better known for its ubiquity around strip malls and dominance on wedding registries, but the retailer also offers a reliable crop of elevated furniture that you can actually check out in person at its brick-and-mortar store before throwing down a bunch of cash. Designer collaborations with the likes of Leanne Ford, Athena Calderone, and Jake Arnold are big perks of shopping at this retailer if you lack the cash to afford a custom piece.Modern furniture styles, variety of furniture for all areas of the homeShipping is free on orders more than $99Between $6 and 10% of merchandise and $24.95 and 10% for express deliveriesBetween $16 and 10% of merchandise + $10 for deliveries to Alaska, Hawaii, and U.S. territories in 7 to 15 business days and between $28.95 and 10% of merchandise and $22.95 for deliveries in 3 to 5 business daysThumaThuma Essential BedThuma NightstandBedroom furniture doesn’t need to scream “conversation starter!” It just needs to be well-made. And Thuma, with its signature Japanese joinery techniques, sells the kinds of pieces that are durable but also not a complete headache to put together. Pieces easily fit into each other without much assembly needed, whether you’re talking bed frames (the brand’s bread and butter) or nightstands and storage solutions in simple wood finishes.Lifetime warranty, sustainably made, design advice via virtual appointmentsLimited inventory when it comes to furnitureLulu and GeorgiaLulu and Georgia Kimberly Side TableSarah Sherman Samuel for Lulu and Georgia Babs Corner SectionalLulu and Georgia’s a design destination that’s full of quirks and surprises, so it’s exactly the place to be if you want to surface something that doesn’t look like anything else at a big-box retailer (take the elliptical-legged side table here or the segmented design of this chocolate sectional). The forward-thinking furniture store is run by a family that’s been designing interiors for three generations, and frequently works with designers like AD100 All-Star Sarah Sherman Samuel. She’s reason enough to shop here for her clever takes on outdoor furniture, throw pillows, and even fireplace decor.Trendy designs, designer collabs, family-owned companyThe brand doesn’t provide swatchesBetween $8.95 and 10% for standard shipping, +$25 on standard shipping charge for FedEx two-day shippingMcGee & Co.McGee & Co. Merlot Marble Coffee TableMcGee & Co. Asher BenchUnder McGee & Co.’s umbrella, you’ll find a fair share of barn-style trestle tables, Shaker-inspired design, and twee decor like bow-embellished shower curtains, so it’s certainly a place to bookmark for all things farmhouse style and cottagecore. We've long been a fan of interior designer Shea McGee’s line, which retails for reasonable prices and also has a surprising range (including some truly adorable kid’s furniture).Great prices and a wide variety of cottagecore and farmhouse-style designsWood designs often feature MDF materialsBetween $8.50 and 10% of order total for standard shipping, though certain home decor categories ship free when you spend over $150EtsyMid-Century Modern Floating CabinetSideboard Granadella With Mediterranean Lattice DoorsEtsy’s huge selection of crafty, handmade goods extends to furniture of the vintage kind and ones that are newly designed too. Midcentury-modern dining tables? Etsy has those. Moroccan rugs? Those too. Ceramic tableware? Yep. And with every purchase, know that you’re supporting a small-business owner somewhere in the world.Designs by small business owners, handcrafted offerings, unique, eclectic furniture stylesShipping timeline depends seller by seller, authenticity should always be verifiedVaries based on the seller’s settings and locationsAlbany ParkPark Sectional SofaAlbany Park Kova Pit SectionalAlbany Park, founded by former NFL player Darryl Sharpton and his wife Jessica, is on a mission to take the confusion out of furniture shopping. Instead of offering dozens of lines, there are only a limited selection of collections in various colors and patterns. That way, it’s easier to choose what you really want instead of wading through endless, nearly identical options. The brand is responsible for some of our favorite couches of all time, including the aptly-named “Park” sectional (as in, “park yourself right here”).Family-owned brand, streamlined designs, durably made furnitureLimited colorway availabilitySixpennySixpenny Neva Chaise SectionalSixpenny Ora Dining BenchBeloved by AD editors and celebrities like Ashley Tisdale, Sixpenny’s eco-friendly furniture offerings includes pieces for your bedroom, dining room, and living room. With an ethos that revolves around quality materials, you’ll find the brand’s items are made from ethically-sourced down feathers, frames handcrafted from kiln-dried solid hardwood, and all-natural linen-cotton covering options. Highlights include bed frames, coffee tables, children’s furniture, and the Neva Chaise Sectional senior design editor Zoë Sessums called “one of the most comfy couches I’ve spent time on in a while.”The brand sources materials directly, earth-friendly designed furnitureCustom orders—orders made with specifications other than the existing assortment available on the Sixpenny site—are final sale and not eligible for promotionsShipping is free, and the brand offers two delivery service options— complimentary threshold delivery and white glove delivery for $100Benchmade ModernBenchMade Modern Uncle Sal Sofa With ChaiseBenchmade Modern Knox Accent ChairIf bespoke furniture is what you’re after, look no further than BenchMade Modern. The brand offers endless customizations (down to the exact measurements of some items) and specializes in fast production. For items like a sectional sofa (one of which we reviewed during Seat Week), Benchmade even sends a free swatch kit and a genius paper cutout to help measure your space—making your selection process that much easier.Made-to-order furniture, most furniture is shipped fully assembled, the brand mails you a free, true-to-size printout of your sofa of choice so you can envision how it will look in your spaceThe brand doesn’t allow promo codes to be used during on-site sales or promotionBetween $29 and $89 for standard delivery, between $149 and $349 for threshold delivery, between $299 and $499 for white glove deliveryPerigoldAudo Copenhagen Brasilia Lounge ChairBlu Dot Browser Add-on BookcaseThere’s a lot going on at Perigold (in a good way), from contemporary brands to more traditional names that span Audo Copenhagen, Blu Dot, and the interior designer-beloved Four Hands. You could easily spend a few hours browsing here for furnishings, so go in with an idea of what you’re looking for and do some filtering ahead of your next interiors overhaul.Classic design styles, luxe fabrics like velvetLarge stock to sift throughBetween $4.99 and $99.99 for large items and full-service deliverySabai DesignSabai Essential SectionalSabai Evergreen ChairSabai's specific angle on furniture is sustainability cred and affordable sofas, like their essential sectional that we tested. “The couch feels very comfortable and has a buoyant feel when I sit on it, which seems to fight against any tendency for sagging,” says contributor Mark Burka in his review. “The couch feels so well made and strong, with the ability to hold three adults and a dog at once.”Huge furniture selection, multiple design styles to shop, sustainably made furnitureSome customers might find the furniture designs more genericBetween $5.95 and 10% + $26 for standard and next-day shipping, between $159 and $429 for local and national white glove deliverySSENSEHerman Miller Eames Molded Plastic ArmchairGustaf Westman Objects Beige Curvy Mini Side TableSSENSE may be the place you source the latest Samba drops along with under-the-radar runway designs from overseas, but the buzzy Canadian retailer also sells a decent amount of furniture in its catchall “Everything Else” section. From iconic Herman Miller and Vitra designs to newer makers like Gustaf Westman, there’s a little something for everyone to drool over until it inevitably gets added to the retailer’s ongoing clearance section.Fashion-inspired designs, flat-rate shippingNot ideal for traditionalists$14 for standard deliveriesDesign Within ReachSarah Ellison Chromeo OttomanHerman Miller Eames Lounge Chair and OttomanIf you want to turn your home into a modern marvel, look no further than DWR, the design lover's ultimate source for sleek furniture and archival designs from the likes of Noguchi, Knoll, HAY (which sells exclusively at DWR now), Herman Miller, and Sara Ellison. Whether you want to spruce up your home office with an Aeron office chair or overhaul your living room, DWR has the classics to transform your space.Modern, elegant furniture, made of high-quality, durable materials like solid woodLess ideal for maximalist home stylesDelivery within contiguous U.S.: Between 10% of order value to $599 per trip for in-home delivery over 100 miles of a studioDelivery to Alaska, Puerto Rico, or Hawaii: Between 15% of order value to $949 for local in-home deliveriesDelivery to Canada: Between 10% of order value to $599 for deliveries over 100 miles of a studioSundaysField Dining TableSundays Wind Down 3-Piece Modular SectionalFrom weather-resistant outdoor furniture to luxe bed frames and stylish coffee tables, Sunday's site is stacked with pages upon pages of trend-forward design. These are pieces that will blend right in with all kinds of interior styles, from minimalist situations and farmhouse vibes, to contemporary with a capital C. “This sectional is extremely kid-friendly,” says AD contributor Shoko Wanger in her review of the brand's Wind Down Modular sectional. “It’s deep, has soft edges, and has retained its shape and color despite the aforementioned daily pummeling from our three-year-old. Also, the moveable ottoman has proven extremely versatile.”Complimentary assembly on large items, timeless furniture designsFurniture might not fit in some rooms, especially in smaller apartmentsFree delivery in the U.S. and CanadaBurrowBurrow Range 2-Piece SofaBurrow Index Wall ShelfOne of the things we love most about Burrow is its infinitely customizable furniture. You can choose, for example, a couch or chair and then customize the fabric color, leg finish, arm style, and whether or not the pillows are tufted. With all these options, it’s easy to get exactly what you want.Easy assembly, mid-century modern styles, expandable furniture designsCustomers cannot make changes to the order after it is placed, limited customization optionsFloydFour-Piece Form Sectional by FloydThe Bed Frame by FloydDetroit-based Floyd is the next name on our guide of brands you should know. You may recognize its viral bed frame from your Instagram feed, but the furniture maker’s other offerings are equally photogenic. What’s more is that all of the brand’s pieces are made to last and come with a 10-year warranty—including the AD-approved Floyd sectional sofa.MoMA Design StoreMoMA Two-Way Side TableArtek Aalto Stacking Stool 60For both iconic designs and one-offs from emerging designers, check out the MoMA Design Store. Though the online shop component of the MoMA museum certainly skews toward kitchen gadgets, decor, accessories, and gifts, don’t sleep on the curated furniture selection. Here you can find pieces that are showcased in the museum's permanent collection, like the Eames chair and Kartell Componibili storage, side by side with modern brands like Hay and Areaware.Art-inspired designs, pieces from up-and-coming designersInternational shipping information is not available$7.95 flat fee standard shipping, $24.95 for express shipping, $32.95 for overnight shipping across contiguous U.S.IKEAIKEA Bror Shelving UnitIkea LINANÄS SofaOrdering online at IKEA has its pros and cons: You can avoid the crowds and the maze-like layout of the store, but you’ll also miss out on the Swedish meatballs. You can also more easily order in person, but for fought-over pieces, online is your best bet. The Swedish retailer's furniture is a rite of passage for starter apartments and a beloved resource for all kinds of design lovers on a budget, with simple Scandi-style options for minimalists and trendier pieces for risk takers. IKEA also has a great compass for design, with throwback archival pieces being a hot commodity in the resell and vintage market.Affordable, unique designsSome assembly instructions can be difficult to navigateSmall order delivery pricing starts at $6. Large order delivery pricing starts at $19 (except in New York city zip codes where delivery starts at $39)AllModernAllModern Dionnen Leather SofaAllModern Shea Poplar Solid Wood Floating Shelf with HooksWayfair's younger cousin AllModern is a more tightly curated collection of affordable-ish modern furniture, from Scandinavian to farmhouse designs. The prices are competitive to other mid-market retailers like CB2 and Crate & Barrel and speedy delivery is another perk.Modern and farmhouse-inspired designs, fast deliveryNot as ideal for traditional home designsBetween $4.99 and $99.99 for full-service deliveryTargetOpalhouse Faux Raffia Floor LampWood & Cane Console TableTarget is killing it lately with its in-house decor brands, which offer everything from midcentury-modern furniture (Project62) to contemporary-meets-country pieces (Hearth & Hand) to colorful bohemian styles (Opalhouse). And though the store gives you a chance to suss things out in person, you’ll find lots more sofas, wall sconces, chaises, and bistro tables online.Celebrity brands like Joanna Gaines’ Hearth and Hand with Magnolia, affordable furniture selection or Justina Blakeney’s Jungalow, variety of design stylesLess high-end options availableFree ship over $35 orders1stDibsCarlo Scarpa “Toledo” Bed for Simon GavinaContemporary Walnut Alpine Floor Lamp by Astraeus Clarke1stDibs is not just a vintage mecca for rare furniture from way back when and archival designs but also a place where lots of rising contemporary design stars like Astraeus Clarke and Analuisa Corrigan sell their pieces. Decor, pillows, lighting solutions, rugs, and beyond are all fair game here. As the name implies, you can place bids on certain items, but the bulk of the newer pieces are a click-and-buy purchase.Mix between and contemporary designs, textiles availableShipping information isn’t availableVaries depending on sellerJoss & MainJoss & Main Eleanne Coffee TableJoss & Main Amaryllis Upholstered SofaWith a wide selection and solid price points, Joss & Main is another name to know in the mid-market furniture scene—with hundreds of brands across every style that won’t set you back a whole rent check. Its sophisticated collections make it easy to plan your dream decor and order right from your laptop or phone. “I tend to favor clean lines and timeless pieces, so when shopping recently for a new living room floor lamp, the Montage Modern caught my eye and held it, even after viewing dozens of additional (and pricier) options,” says Diane Dragan, global director of content strategy and operations of her recent Joss & Main purchase. “When the efficient, compact box arrived (less waste!), assembly was a snap—literally, as the shade fabric clips to the lamp ring, and seals on itself with an invisible magnetic strip. Magic.” Flash sales also happen regularly so you’ll be able to score a nice discount on accents like lighting, area rugs, and more.Variety of furniture designs, clean linesExtra fees for delivering in the homeBetween $4.99 and $99.99 for full-service deliveryCB2CB2 Crain Ivory Enameled Metal Console TableCB2 Serafin Leather DaybedCB2, the younger offshoot of Crate & Barrel, offers a hip selection of modern, minimalist, and midcentury furniture that has made it a go-to for apartment dwellers and first-time home owners alike. CB2 offers free design consultations via video chat, and the company will also help you create mood boards and 3D room renderings. It’s also known for chic collaborations with designers and artists like Lenny Kravitz and Kara Mann.Designer and celebrity collabs, design consultationsNot ideal for traditional design stylesBetween $6 and 10% of merchandise and $24.95 and 10% for express deliveriesBetween $16 and 10% of merchandise + $10 for deliveries to Alaska, Hawaii, and U.S. territories in 7 to 15 business days and between $28.95 and 10% of merchandise and $22.95 for deliveries in 3 to 5 business daysGoodeeFrama Rivet Side TableLuisa TableGoodee is better known for its giftable home goods, but also sells a curated collection of furniture from beloved Danish brands like Skagerak, Ferm Living, and Carl Hansen, plus some adorable recycled plastic kids’ tables and chairs. The retailer’s deep commitment to sustainability and ethical manufacturing is a major perk and it also sells some deeper cuts from Frama in case you’re having trouble finding handsome shelving anywhere else.Family-founded brand, sleek designsNiche furniture selection of Danish brands; delivers to USA and Canada only, and Hawaii and Alaska are exempt from free shipping promotions$12 to $400 standard delivery for orders ranging from $0 to $10,000. $30 to $800 air delivery shipping for orders ranging from $0 to $10,000NeighborNeighbor Teak Wood ChairNeighbor Haven SofaThe nice thing about Neighbor’s designs is that they all kind of go together. The Haven collection is a great example—and would look really good in any backyard situation. The site is all about high-quality outdoor furniture, so keep that in mind as you browse.Variety of outdoor furniture, free swatches, white glove delivery availableNot ideal for indoor home furnishingsBetween $5 and $199 for delivery orders up to $5,000Delivery fees to Hawaii and Alaska are 10% of order value and a minimum of $195White glove delivery is 10% of order value and a minimum of $195Industry WestMcQueen SofaIndustry West Aero Stackable Dining ChairFans of industrial design could spend an entire afternoon perusing the furniture on Industry West’s site. From ribbed leather sofas and chunky lounge chairs to stone-topped side tables and leggy floor lamps, these pieces will quickly become high-quality staples you’ll love surrounding yourself with from home to home.Ideal for loft-style spaces, chic accent furnitureSome large items ship for an additional $350 handling feeFlat 15% fee for all shippingSchoolhouseFDB Møbler J27 StoolSchoolhouse x Clare V. Marc Striped SofaFor all things colorful, quirky, and fun, come straight to Schoolhouse. Designers tend to love it for its wealth of cheerful lighting, but the bedding and furnishings are pretty great too. Recent highlights include a collab with Clare V. and some truly inspired stools that are quite literally cute as a button.Ideal for maximalist design, heirloom-worthy styles, frequent salesNiche furniture selection availableBetween $9.99 and $399 for orders up to $3,999Urban OutfittersUrban Outfitters Tabitha NightstandAria Coffee TableShopping for furniture is an adventure on Urban Outfitters—you never know what you’ll find. Styles range from funky and eclectic to luxurious and glam, and it’s all Pinterest-worthy. If you’re looking for the small pieces of accent furniture, this brand is a great go-to. “Not only does the slender form pair well with nearly any design aesthetic,” AD PRO senior editor Mel Studach says in her review of the Tabitha nightstand, “It offers two sides: one closed off for minimalist, clutter-free vibes, and the other exposed for piled-on panache.”Maximalist furniture designs, multiple colorway options for several piecesSome larger items can take nearly four weeks to arrive$6.95 standard delivery for orders under $50, free standard delivery for orders over $50MedleyGio SofaAnders ShelfThis environmentally conscious brand is committed to using only nontoxic, eco-friendly materials such as genuine wood (none of the MDF stuff), hypoallergenic wool, and organic textiles while eschewing some of the nastier fire retardants and carcinogens that are baked into some mass-market furnishings. Not only are its products responsibly made and high quality, they’re also very easy on the eyes, offering up handsome shelving solutions, seating, and beyond influenced by midcentury silhouettes.Eco-friendly materials, modern designsSmaller furniture collection than big-name brands in this listInside WeatherInside Weather Modular Bondi Latte ArmchairInside Weather Modular Bondi 3-Seater SofaCustom furniture can get pricey ridiculously fast, but not when you’re shopping the picks at Inside Weather. Even though there are a few core designs, the textile options will have you mixing and matching for hours on end. Plus, many of the furniture designs come with the option to add side tables, arms, or leave it arm-less. You can even choose which side of the furniture you want said side table or arm located. Options are a beautiful thing.Complimentary shipping on all ordersSwatches don’t qualify for free shippingOuterOuter Teak Outdoor Armless Chair (Set of 2)Outer Brown Wicker Outdoor Sofa with Armless ChairsWe named Outer our top outdoor furniture brand for several reasons. First off, this sustainable brand uses recycled materials to make each piece of furniture in their collection. In addition, all of their products are designed to be durable enough to resist the elements and seamlessly fit into an outdoor setup with a classic coastal look.Sustainably made furniture, coastal-inspired designsOuter doesn't own any retail showroomsHemHem Puffy ChairZig Zag Shelf by Studio deFORMFor off-the-beaten-path picks that embody a sense of playfulness, Hem is one of our favorite names in the furniture business. Collaborations with Faye Toogood on the brand's extremely “itty” Puffy Lounge Chair and Studio deFORM on their Zig Zag shelf contribute to their niche, designhead-approved appeal. And the good thing about these picks is that they haven't saturated the market so much that you'll see them plastered all over your Instagram feed.Vibrant accent pieces, upscale designer collaborationsPrice-y and made for a very specific kind of shopperBetween $9 and $299 for standard and white glove deliveryRHCardin DeskJakob Cane Dining ChairYou can shop by room or by decor style on RH (formerly known as Restoration Hardware), a store known for its high-end furnishings beloved by designers and collectors alike. Its extensive selection, plus design consultation services, make furnishing the home of your dreams a rarified, streamlined process.Elegant furniture, design consultation services available$299 for local deliveries, $399 for extended deliveries, $599 for national deliveries, $1,699 for deliveries to Alaska or HawaiiHaworthJive Desk with Post Leg, Color Pop CollectionEmeco Broom StoolWorkplace furniture does not have to be boring—far from it. Haworth’s designs come straight from that cool office you saw on Instagram, from desks with colorful peg legs to gaming chairs that aren’t an eyesore (which are extremely hard to find, FWIW).Helpful for furnishing a home office, vibrant designs availableLimited variety of furnitureShipping costs vary by productJayson HomePovera SideboardSimple Light Antique BenchJayson Home specializes in unique and vintage-inspired furniture sourced from around the world. You'll find everything from selenite logs and leather coolers to airy pendants and midcentury burlwood desks with brass detailing. We’re such fans of their Chicago flagship, we named them one of the 83 Best Home Decor Stores in America.Classic designs, eclectic decor, fun vintage selectionMultiple discounts can’t be applied to an orderWhat to consider before making an online furniture purchase:But before you go all in on something, there are a couple of things you’ll want to keep in mind during your search. First up: measure, measure, measure. Testing out furniture IRL is great but not always possible. The last thing you want is to fall in love with something online only to find out it won’t fit through your front door or in the nook it was meant to inhabit. On that note, make sure to measure the package as well—the box will add a couple of inches that you’ll have to account for.In addition to measuring, consider if you’re going to want this piece of furniture to travel with you from home to home. If you’re working with a larger budget and consider the furniture you’re seeking out to be an investment piece of sorts, you may not want to lean completely into a trending color or texture—such as a hot pink corduroy couch. And we have nothing against hot pink corduroy couches (we love them), but you may not be as into the bold statement in 10 years as you are now. Consider this food for thought.With two of the biggest considerations out of the way, go forth and seek out that ottoman or couch you’ve been thinking about for years.
html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, when you buy something through our retail links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

The best online furniture stores have a few things in common: a well-curated selection of items, decent enough shipping timelines to get you that sectional sofa right on schedule, and of course enough style to round out your home without dragging down your decor scheme. So many newer D2C players have entered the flatpacking arena, though, that we thought we’d pull together a list of the all-time greats and all of our newer faves for furniture that are here for a long time (not just for the duration of your current rental).

One of our editors’ favorite pastimes is scrolling through pages and pages of credenzas and tables galore [gestures wildly to all the categories on our shopping site] so naturally we're happy to fill you in on what's worth the browse, what actually ships out fast (and occasionally free), plus what our editors own from the stores mentioned below. Household names like West Elm, IKEA, and Crate & Barrel are no-brainers on the list, but others, like Hem and Sabai, are also great smaller businesses to add to your search. Read on and discover the best online furniture stores that all come AD-approved, plus be sure to check out our favorite lighting and outdoor furniture destinations, too.

The Best Online Furniture Brands, According to AD:

  • Best Online-Only Furniture Brand: Article
  • Best Minimalist Furniture Brand: Castlery
  • Best Budget Furniture Brand: Wayfair
  • Best Splurge-Worthy Furniture Brand: Arhaus
  • Best Coastal-Inspired Furniture Brand: Serena & Lily
  • Best Bohemian-Style Furniture Brand: Anthropologie

Article

Article Nordby Sleeper Sofa

Article Muhly Oak Sideboard

Who needs a brick-and-mortar store when you can be shipping out all kinds of midcentury-inspired designs right to people’s doorsteps? That’s the thinking behind Article, one of our favorite online-only design destinations for affordable-ish furniture (think woven sofas draped in performance fabric and chubby-legged credenzas and tables). The Nordby sleeper sofa in particular is one of our editors’ favorites for its minimalist lines and down-to-earth design.

Great for modern design enthusiasts and outdoor furniture offerings

  • $49 flat-rate Front Door Delivery fee for larger items that can’t be shipped by courier
  • $19 fee for smaller items or those under $200 via courier
  • $199 in-room delivery and assembly service

Castlery

Castlery Harper Lift-Top Coffee Table

Castlery Jonathan Chaise Sectional Sofa

Castlery is a one-stop shop for tasteful high-low goods, with pieces of furniture organized by room and easily filtered by price point, material, color, size, and more so you can easily find what you need. There's a huge selection of classic, contemporary, and midcentury-modern pieces online and even a virtual showroom that lets you “wander” through their IRL warehouse. Castlery will even send out three free swatches for any product you’re interested in and has a 14-day return policy in case you're not in love with what you’ve just set up in your space. We’ve personally tested the Jonathan sofa seen here and the Ingrid arm chair ourselves in case you need a preview of what’s worth shopping. Both have received glowing reviews from staffers and contributors.

Frequent sales, mid-century modern designs, free swatches available

Flat fee varies based on location

Wayfair

Brayden Studio Allrich Cloud Coffee Table

Joss & Main Amala Upholstered Sofa

Wayfair’s reputation as a budget home goods destination precedes itself—the brand rivals Amazon in terms of inventory, but it specializes in furniture in particular. We’ve tested dozens of furniture and decor items from sleeper sofas to sectionals to office chairs and floating shelves, so we have a good sense of what feels a lot more luxury than the price tag would suggest. And if you want to hold out for a particularly good deal, the brand’s annual Way Day sale, which unfurls discounts on thousands of items and a bunch of flash sales, is not to be missed either.

Affordable retailer, frequent sales, home to a variety of furniture design styles and everything else you might need (appliances, tech goods, etc.)

Furniture assembly is available by Angi and Wayfair Home Services, but customers must move the product to the desired assembly location since the professionals are not responsible for moving the product

Free Shipping over $35 and $4.99 flat-rate shipping for orders under $35

Arhaus

Arhaus Kipton Sofa

Arhaus Wolfe Chair

Arhaus (German for house) offers high-end, heirloom-quality furniture for every room of the house, plus plenty of artisanal decor and lighting options online and in its brick-and-mortar stores around the country. The Kipton sofa seen here, with its easy silhouette and seemingly endless customization options, is another AD favorite.

Heirloom-quality furniture, sustainably made pieces, white glove delivery service

  • White glove delivery: $299 local delivery, $399 extended delivery areas, and $399 to $599 (depending on your location) national delivery (excluding Alaska and Hawaii).
  • Package Carrier Delivery Rates: Between $9 and $160 for standard delivery, between $59 and $210 for expedited delivery, and between $84 and $235 for express delivery

Serena & Lily

Serena & Lily Beach House Wide Chaise

Serena & Lily Scallop Side Table

Serena & Lily channels calm, coastal vibes for your beach house or back porch, featuring lots of wicker and nautical blues and whites. Shop the brand’s collection for deep couches, statement-making end tables, expansive coffee tables, unique console tables, hand-knotted area rugs, striking outdoor dining sets, and so much more.

Sales throughout the year, abundance of outdoor furniture to choose from, offers an interior design service

Might not fit a variety of home design styles like traditional

  • Fedex: small ($19), medium ($49), and large ($149) deliveries in contiguous U.S.
  • Fedex: small ($49), medium ($99), and large ( $449) deliveries in Alaska and Hawaii
  • Home delivery: Between $149 and $299 for doorstep delivery up to 151+ miles, between $199 and $399 for room of choice delivery, between $299 and $599 for white glove delivery

Anthropologie

Anthropologie Havana Leather Chair

Fern Storage Cabinet

Anthropologie’s furniture selection is a colorful extension of their clothing collection, and every time a new collection rolls out, it’s almost guaranteed we see something we love. Packed with personality and bohemian flair, the designs—like the Havana leather chair we reviewed during Seat Week—are not for wallflowers. “I envision this chair in a modern Boho-style space imbued with warm hues, eclectic textures, and a cozy atmosphere," says Livia Caligor, AD’s U.S. content operations manager in her review. And though pieces tend to fall in the splurge-worthy category, sales happen fairly regularly for scoring deals.

Bold furniture design, contemporary styles

Limited stock for some furniture pieces

Between $6.95 and $15.95 or free ship on $50+ orders for standard shipping, add $10 for express shipping, add $15 for overnight shipping

Pottery Barn

Pottery Barn Surrey Sofa

Cayman Platform Bed and Headboard

This mainstay is a household name for a reason. Based in San Francisco and part of the Williams-Sonoma portfolio (alongside West Elm and Rejuvenation), there are many locations you can shop in-store around the world. Pottery Barn also stocks a huge online selection that puts their collections at your fingertips no matter where you are. Their high-quality furniture ranges from classic to contemporary—and, after nearly a century in business, they’re prioritizing sustainability with initiatives centered on responsibly sourced wood and cotton and recycled fabrics.

Huge furniture selection, multiple design styles to shop, sustainably made furniture

Some customers might find the furniture designs more generic

Between $5.95 and 10% + $26 for standard and next-day shipping, between $159 and $429 for local and national white glove delivery

Amazon

Laura Davidson Furniture Padded Office Chair

Rane Futon

You already know Amazon has everything under the sun, but did you know that it includes budget-friendly furniture for all rooms of the home, complete with free delivery? The myriad filtering options help you find exactly what you’re looking for, whether that’s a down comforter, a small-space humidifier, or a housewarming gift. Amazon is also the exclusive retailer for a few different decor brands at affordable prices, including Rivet, Stone & Beam, Christopher Knight Home, and Now House by Jonathan Adler, but you can also surface modern brands like Yamazaki Home and Umbra there, too.

Affordable furniture options, free, quick shipping with Prime membership

While Amazon has a premium home storefront, quality varies among its third-party and lesser-known sellers and warranties are harder to come by

Free with Prime membership

West Elm

Marcus Samuelsson Dining Table by West Elm

West Elm Laurent Chaise Sectional

Brooklyn-based retailer West Elm, a Williams-Sonoma brand, is a popular choice for modern design picks of all stripes for city dwellers and beyond, but that’s only part of the store’s appeal. West Elm also sells lots of organic, handcrafted, sustainably sourced, and Fair Trade Certified items among its decor and linens. Sales abound if you’re eyeing something in particular, and you can take a baseline 15% off when you sign up for their emails.

Handmade offerings, sustainably sourced home goods, affordable options

Some customers might find the quality less high-end than other boutique furniture stores on this list

Rove Concepts

Rove Concepts Gallus Coffee Table

Rove Concepts Reya Curved Sectional

Rove Concepts is the place to shop if you’re looking to mimic the effortlessly chic vibes of your favorite celebrity’s home. The furniture sets in particular are worth checking out if you experience decision fatigue and want the same sleek look all-around.

Contemporary, Scandinavian designs, clean lines, timeless aesthetic

Items only ship to the USA and Canada, except for Hawaii, Alaska, Puerto Rico and Nunavut

$159 for all orders up to $5,000 in value

Interior Define

Interior Define Rowan Accent Chair

Interior Define Lennox Loveseat

Interior Define is a retailer that has never seen a rich fabric swatch it didn’t love, and has become known for its infinitely customizable, well-designed staples that will last for years without breaking down in quality. Not only can you personalize the color of each piece, but you can also easily select other options such as fill, furniture legs, cushion style, and more, all from their website or brick-and-mortar shops in select cities. In addition to furniture, they also sell a solid selection of rugs and lighting to polish off a space.

All items are made to order, neutral furniture essentials

Pricier delivery fee for upholstered furniture

Between $14 and $279 for standard shipping

Crate & Barrel

Hugger Curved Boucle Apartment Sofa by Leanne Ford

Ceremonie Green Mohair Dining Chair by Athena Calderone

Crate & Barrel may be better known for its ubiquity around strip malls and dominance on wedding registries, but the retailer also offers a reliable crop of elevated furniture that you can actually check out in person at its brick-and-mortar store before throwing down a bunch of cash. Designer collaborations with the likes of Leanne Ford, Athena Calderone, and Jake Arnold are big perks of shopping at this retailer if you lack the cash to afford a custom piece.

Modern furniture styles, variety of furniture for all areas of the home

  • Shipping is free on orders more than $99
  • Between $6 and 10% of merchandise and $24.95 and 10% for express deliveries
  • Between $16 and 10% of merchandise + $10 for deliveries to Alaska, Hawaii, and U.S. territories in 7 to 15 business days and between $28.95 and 10% of merchandise and $22.95 for deliveries in 3 to 5 business days

Thuma

Thuma Essential Bed

Thuma Nightstand

Bedroom furniture doesn’t need to scream “conversation starter!” It just needs to be well-made. And Thuma, with its signature Japanese joinery techniques, sells the kinds of pieces that are durable but also not a complete headache to put together. Pieces easily fit into each other without much assembly needed, whether you’re talking bed frames (the brand’s bread and butter) or nightstands and storage solutions in simple wood finishes.

Lifetime warranty, sustainably made, design advice via virtual appointments

Limited inventory when it comes to furniture

Lulu and Georgia

Lulu and Georgia Kimberly Side Table

Sarah Sherman Samuel for Lulu and Georgia Babs Corner Sectional

Lulu and Georgia’s a design destination that’s full of quirks and surprises, so it’s exactly the place to be if you want to surface something that doesn’t look like anything else at a big-box retailer (take the elliptical-legged side table here or the segmented design of this chocolate sectional). The forward-thinking furniture store is run by a family that’s been designing interiors for three generations, and frequently works with designers like AD100 All-Star Sarah Sherman Samuel. She’s reason enough to shop here for her clever takes on outdoor furniture, throw pillows, and even fireplace decor.

Trendy designs, designer collabs, family-owned company

The brand doesn’t provide swatches

Between $8.95 and 10% for standard shipping, +$25 on standard shipping charge for FedEx two-day shipping

McGee & Co.

McGee & Co. Merlot Marble Coffee Table

McGee & Co. Asher Bench

Under McGee & Co.’s umbrella, you’ll find a fair share of barn-style trestle tables, Shaker-inspired design, and twee decor like bow-embellished shower curtains, so it’s certainly a place to bookmark for all things farmhouse style and cottagecore. We've long been a fan of interior designer Shea McGee’s line, which retails for reasonable prices and also has a surprising range (including some truly adorable kid’s furniture).

Great prices and a wide variety of cottagecore and farmhouse-style designs

Wood designs often feature MDF materials

Between $8.50 and 10% of order total for standard shipping, though certain home decor categories ship free when you spend over $150

Etsy

Mid-Century Modern Floating Cabinet

Sideboard Granadella With Mediterranean Lattice Doors

Etsy’s huge selection of crafty, handmade goods extends to furniture of the vintage kind and ones that are newly designed too. Midcentury-modern dining tables? Etsy has those. Moroccan rugs? Those too. Ceramic tableware? Yep. And with every purchase, know that you’re supporting a small-business owner somewhere in the world.

Designs by small business owners, handcrafted offerings, unique, eclectic furniture styles

Shipping timeline depends seller by seller, authenticity should always be verified

Varies based on the seller’s settings and locations

Albany Park

Park Sectional Sofa

Albany Park Kova Pit Sectional

Albany Park, founded by former NFL player Darryl Sharpton and his wife Jessica, is on a mission to take the confusion out of furniture shopping. Instead of offering dozens of lines, there are only a limited selection of collections in various colors and patterns. That way, it’s easier to choose what you really want instead of wading through endless, nearly identical options. The brand is responsible for some of our favorite couches of all time, including the aptly-named “Park” sectional (as in, “park yourself right here”).

Family-owned brand, streamlined designs, durably made furniture

Limited colorway availability

Sixpenny

Sixpenny Neva Chaise Sectional

Sixpenny Ora Dining Bench

Beloved by AD editors and celebrities like Ashley Tisdale, Sixpenny’s eco-friendly furniture offerings includes pieces for your bedroom, dining room, and living room. With an ethos that revolves around quality materials, you’ll find the brand’s items are made from ethically-sourced down feathers, frames handcrafted from kiln-dried solid hardwood, and all-natural linen-cotton covering options. Highlights include bed frames, coffee tables, children’s furniture, and the Neva Chaise Sectional senior design editor Zoë Sessums called “one of the most comfy couches I’ve spent time on in a while.”

The brand sources materials directly, earth-friendly designed furniture

Custom orders—orders made with specifications other than the existing assortment available on the Sixpenny site—are final sale and not eligible for promotions

Shipping is free, and the brand offers two delivery service options— complimentary threshold delivery and white glove delivery for $100

Benchmade Modern

BenchMade Modern Uncle Sal Sofa With Chaise

Benchmade Modern Knox Accent Chair

If bespoke furniture is what you’re after, look no further than BenchMade Modern. The brand offers endless customizations (down to the exact measurements of some items) and specializes in fast production. For items like a sectional sofa (one of which we reviewed during Seat Week), Benchmade even sends a free swatch kit and a genius paper cutout to help measure your space—making your selection process that much easier.

Made-to-order furniture, most furniture is shipped fully assembled, the brand mails you a free, true-to-size printout of your sofa of choice so you can envision how it will look in your space

The brand doesn’t allow promo codes to be used during on-site sales or promotion

Between $29 and $89 for standard delivery, between $149 and $349 for threshold delivery, between $299 and $499 for white glove delivery

Perigold

Audo Copenhagen Brasilia Lounge Chair

Blu Dot Browser Add-on Bookcase

There’s a lot going on at Perigold (in a good way), from contemporary brands to more traditional names that span Audo Copenhagen, Blu Dot, and the interior designer-beloved Four Hands. You could easily spend a few hours browsing here for furnishings, so go in with an idea of what you’re looking for and do some filtering ahead of your next interiors overhaul.

Classic design styles, luxe fabrics like velvet

Large stock to sift through

Between $4.99 and $99.99 for large items and full-service delivery

Sabai Design

Sabai Essential Sectional

Sabai Evergreen Chair

Sabai's specific angle on furniture is sustainability cred and affordable sofas, like their essential sectional that we tested. “The couch feels very comfortable and has a buoyant feel when I sit on it, which seems to fight against any tendency for sagging,” says contributor Mark Burka in his review. “The couch feels so well made and strong, with the ability to hold three adults and a dog at once.”

Huge furniture selection, multiple design styles to shop, sustainably made furniture

Some customers might find the furniture designs more generic

Between $5.95 and 10% + $26 for standard and next-day shipping, between $159 and $429 for local and national white glove delivery

SSENSE

Herman Miller Eames Molded Plastic Armchair

Gustaf Westman Objects Beige Curvy Mini Side Table

SSENSE may be the place you source the latest Samba drops along with under-the-radar runway designs from overseas, but the buzzy Canadian retailer also sells a decent amount of furniture in its catchall “Everything Else” section. From iconic Herman Miller and Vitra designs to newer makers like Gustaf Westman, there’s a little something for everyone to drool over until it inevitably gets added to the retailer’s ongoing clearance section.

Fashion-inspired designs, flat-rate shipping

Not ideal for traditionalists

$14 for standard deliveries

Design Within Reach

Sarah Ellison Chromeo Ottoman

Herman Miller Eames Lounge Chair and Ottoman

If you want to turn your home into a modern marvel, look no further than DWR, the design lover's ultimate source for sleek furniture and archival designs from the likes of Noguchi, Knoll, HAY (which sells exclusively at DWR now), Herman Miller, and Sara Ellison. Whether you want to spruce up your home office with an Aeron office chair or overhaul your living room, DWR has the classics to transform your space.

Modern, elegant furniture, made of high-quality, durable materials like solid wood

Less ideal for maximalist home styles

  • Delivery within contiguous U.S.: Between 10% of order value to $599 per trip for in-home delivery over 100 miles of a studio
  • Delivery to Alaska, Puerto Rico, or Hawaii: Between 15% of order value to $949 for local in-home deliveries
  • Delivery to Canada: Between 10% of order value to $599 for deliveries over 100 miles of a studio

Sundays

Field Dining Table

Sundays Wind Down 3-Piece Modular Sectional

From weather-resistant outdoor furniture to luxe bed frames and stylish coffee tables, Sunday's site is stacked with pages upon pages of trend-forward design. These are pieces that will blend right in with all kinds of interior styles, from minimalist situations and farmhouse vibes, to contemporary with a capital C. “This sectional is extremely kid-friendly,” says AD contributor Shoko Wanger in her review of the brand's Wind Down Modular sectional. “It’s deep, has soft edges, and has retained its shape and color despite the aforementioned daily pummeling from our three-year-old. Also, the moveable ottoman has proven extremely versatile.”

Complimentary assembly on large items, timeless furniture designs

Furniture might not fit in some rooms, especially in smaller apartments

Free delivery in the U.S. and Canada

Burrow

Burrow Range 2-Piece Sofa

Burrow Index Wall Shelf

One of the things we love most about Burrow is its infinitely customizable furniture. You can choose, for example, a couch or chair and then customize the fabric color, leg finish, arm style, and whether or not the pillows are tufted. With all these options, it’s easy to get exactly what you want.

Easy assembly, mid-century modern styles, expandable furniture designs

Customers cannot make changes to the order after it is placed, limited customization options

Floyd

Four-Piece Form Sectional by Floyd

The Bed Frame by Floyd

Detroit-based Floyd is the next name on our guide of brands you should know. You may recognize its viral bed frame from your Instagram feed, but the furniture maker’s other offerings are equally photogenic. What’s more is that all of the brand’s pieces are made to last and come with a 10-year warranty—including the AD-approved Floyd sectional sofa.

MoMA Design Store

MoMA Two-Way Side Table

Artek Aalto Stacking Stool 60

For both iconic designs and one-offs from emerging designers, check out the MoMA Design Store. Though the online shop component of the MoMA museum certainly skews toward kitchen gadgets, decor, accessories, and gifts, don’t sleep on the curated furniture selection. Here you can find pieces that are showcased in the museum's permanent collection, like the Eames chair and Kartell Componibili storage, side by side with modern brands like Hay and Areaware.

Art-inspired designs, pieces from up-and-coming designers

International shipping information is not available

$7.95 flat fee standard shipping, $24.95 for express shipping, $32.95 for overnight shipping across contiguous U.S.

IKEA

IKEA Bror Shelving Unit

Ikea LINANÄS Sofa

Ordering online at IKEA has its pros and cons: You can avoid the crowds and the maze-like layout of the store, but you’ll also miss out on the Swedish meatballs. You can also more easily order in person, but for fought-over pieces, online is your best bet. The Swedish retailer's furniture is a rite of passage for starter apartments and a beloved resource for all kinds of design lovers on a budget, with simple Scandi-style options for minimalists and trendier pieces for risk takers. IKEA also has a great compass for design, with throwback archival pieces being a hot commodity in the resell and vintage market.

Affordable, unique designs

Some assembly instructions can be difficult to navigate

Small order delivery pricing starts at $6. Large order delivery pricing starts at $19 (except in New York city zip codes where delivery starts at $39)

AllModern

AllModern Dionnen Leather Sofa

AllModern Shea Poplar Solid Wood Floating Shelf with Hooks

Wayfair's younger cousin AllModern is a more tightly curated collection of affordable-ish modern furniture, from Scandinavian to farmhouse designs. The prices are competitive to other mid-market retailers like CB2 and Crate & Barrel and speedy delivery is another perk.

Modern and farmhouse-inspired designs, fast delivery

Not as ideal for traditional home designs

Between $4.99 and $99.99 for full-service delivery

Target

Opalhouse Faux Raffia Floor Lamp

Wood & Cane Console Table

Target is killing it lately with its in-house decor brands, which offer everything from midcentury-modern furniture (Project62) to contemporary-meets-country pieces (Hearth & Hand) to colorful bohemian styles (Opalhouse). And though the store gives you a chance to suss things out in person, you’ll find lots more sofas, wall sconces, chaises, and bistro tables online.

Celebrity brands like Joanna Gaines’ Hearth and Hand with Magnolia, affordable furniture selection or Justina Blakeney’s Jungalow, variety of design styles

Less high-end options available

Free ship over $35 orders

1stDibs

Carlo Scarpa “Toledo” Bed for Simon Gavina

Contemporary Walnut Alpine Floor Lamp by Astraeus Clarke

1stDibs is not just a vintage mecca for rare furniture from way back when and archival designs but also a place where lots of rising contemporary design stars like Astraeus Clarke and Analuisa Corrigan sell their pieces. Decor, pillows, lighting solutions, rugs, and beyond are all fair game here. As the name implies, you can place bids on certain items, but the bulk of the newer pieces are a click-and-buy purchase.

Mix between and contemporary designs, textiles available

Shipping information isn’t available

Varies depending on seller

Joss & Main

Joss & Main Eleanne Coffee Table

Joss & Main Amaryllis Upholstered Sofa

With a wide selection and solid price points, Joss & Main is another name to know in the mid-market furniture scene—with hundreds of brands across every style that won’t set you back a whole rent check. Its sophisticated collections make it easy to plan your dream decor and order right from your laptop or phone. “I tend to favor clean lines and timeless pieces, so when shopping recently for a new living room floor lamp, the Montage Modern caught my eye and held it, even after viewing dozens of additional (and pricier) options,” says Diane Dragan, global director of content strategy and operations of her recent Joss & Main purchase. “When the efficient, compact box arrived (less waste!), assembly was a snap—literally, as the shade fabric clips to the lamp ring, and seals on itself with an invisible magnetic strip. Magic.” Flash sales also happen regularly so you’ll be able to score a nice discount on accents like lighting, area rugs, and more.

Variety of furniture designs, clean lines

Extra fees for delivering in the home

Between $4.99 and $99.99 for full-service delivery

CB2

CB2 Crain Ivory Enameled Metal Console Table

CB2 Serafin Leather Daybed

CB2, the younger offshoot of Crate & Barrel, offers a hip selection of modern, minimalist, and midcentury furniture that has made it a go-to for apartment dwellers and first-time home owners alike. CB2 offers free design consultations via video chat, and the company will also help you create mood boards and 3D room renderings. It’s also known for chic collaborations with designers and artists like Lenny Kravitz and Kara Mann.

Designer and celebrity collabs, design consultations

Not ideal for traditional design styles

  • Between $6 and 10% of merchandise and $24.95 and 10% for express deliveries
  • Between $16 and 10% of merchandise + $10 for deliveries to Alaska, Hawaii, and U.S. territories in 7 to 15 business days and between $28.95 and 10% of merchandise and $22.95 for deliveries in 3 to 5 business days

Goodee

Frama Rivet Side Table

Luisa Table

Goodee is better known for its giftable home goods, but also sells a curated collection of furniture from beloved Danish brands like Skagerak, Ferm Living, and Carl Hansen, plus some adorable recycled plastic kids’ tables and chairs. The retailer’s deep commitment to sustainability and ethical manufacturing is a major perk and it also sells some deeper cuts from Frama in case you’re having trouble finding handsome shelving anywhere else.

Family-founded brand, sleek designs

Niche furniture selection of Danish brands; delivers to USA and Canada only, and Hawaii and Alaska are exempt from free shipping promotions

$12 to $400 standard delivery for orders ranging from $0 to $10,000. $30 to $800 air delivery shipping for orders ranging from $0 to $10,000

Neighbor

Neighbor Teak Wood Chair

Neighbor Haven Sofa

The nice thing about Neighbor’s designs is that they all kind of go together. The Haven collection is a great example—and would look really good in any backyard situation. The site is all about high-quality outdoor furniture, so keep that in mind as you browse.

Variety of outdoor furniture, free swatches, white glove delivery available

Not ideal for indoor home furnishings

  • Between $5 and $199 for delivery orders up to $5,000
  • Delivery fees to Hawaii and Alaska are 10% of order value and a minimum of $195
  • White glove delivery is 10% of order value and a minimum of $195

Industry West

McQueen Sofa

Industry West Aero Stackable Dining Chair

Fans of industrial design could spend an entire afternoon perusing the furniture on Industry West’s site. From ribbed leather sofas and chunky lounge chairs to stone-topped side tables and leggy floor lamps, these pieces will quickly become high-quality staples you’ll love surrounding yourself with from home to home.

Ideal for loft-style spaces, chic accent furniture

Some large items ship for an additional $350 handling fee

Flat 15% fee for all shipping

Schoolhouse

FDB Møbler J27 Stool

Schoolhouse x Clare V. Marc Striped Sofa

For all things colorful, quirky, and fun, come straight to Schoolhouse. Designers tend to love it for its wealth of cheerful lighting, but the bedding and furnishings are pretty great too. Recent highlights include a collab with Clare V. and some truly inspired stools that are quite literally cute as a button.

Ideal for maximalist design, heirloom-worthy styles, frequent sales

Niche furniture selection available

Between $9.99 and $399 for orders up to $3,999

Urban Outfitters

Urban Outfitters Tabitha Nightstand

Aria Coffee Table

Shopping for furniture is an adventure on Urban Outfitters—you never know what you’ll find. Styles range from funky and eclectic to luxurious and glam, and it’s all Pinterest-worthy. If you’re looking for the small pieces of accent furniture, this brand is a great go-to. “Not only does the slender form pair well with nearly any design aesthetic,” AD PRO senior editor Mel Studach says in her review of the Tabitha nightstand, “It offers two sides: one closed off for minimalist, clutter-free vibes, and the other exposed for piled-on panache.”

Maximalist furniture designs, multiple colorway options for several pieces

Some larger items can take nearly four weeks to arrive

$6.95 standard delivery for orders under $50, free standard delivery for orders over $50

Medley

Gio Sofa

Anders Shelf

This environmentally conscious brand is committed to using only nontoxic, eco-friendly materials such as genuine wood (none of the MDF stuff), hypoallergenic wool, and organic textiles while eschewing some of the nastier fire retardants and carcinogens that are baked into some mass-market furnishings. Not only are its products responsibly made and high quality, they’re also very easy on the eyes, offering up handsome shelving solutions, seating, and beyond influenced by midcentury silhouettes.

Eco-friendly materials, modern designs

Smaller furniture collection than big-name brands in this list

Inside Weather

Inside Weather Modular Bondi Latte Armchair

Inside Weather Modular Bondi 3-Seater Sofa

Custom furniture can get pricey ridiculously fast, but not when you’re shopping the picks at Inside Weather. Even though there are a few core designs, the textile options will have you mixing and matching for hours on end. Plus, many of the furniture designs come with the option to add side tables, arms, or leave it arm-less. You can even choose which side of the furniture you want said side table or arm located. Options are a beautiful thing.

Complimentary shipping on all orders

Swatches don’t qualify for free shipping

Outer

Outer Teak Outdoor Armless Chair (Set of 2)

Outer Brown Wicker Outdoor Sofa with Armless Chairs

We named Outer our top outdoor furniture brand for several reasons. First off, this sustainable brand uses recycled materials to make each piece of furniture in their collection. In addition, all of their products are designed to be durable enough to resist the elements and seamlessly fit into an outdoor setup with a classic coastal look.

Sustainably made furniture, coastal-inspired designs

Outer doesn't own any retail showrooms

Hem

Hem Puffy Chair

Zig Zag Shelf by Studio deFORM

For off-the-beaten-path picks that embody a sense of playfulness, Hem is one of our favorite names in the furniture business. Collaborations with Faye Toogood on the brand's extremely “itty” Puffy Lounge Chair and Studio deFORM on their Zig Zag shelf contribute to their niche, designhead-approved appeal. And the good thing about these picks is that they haven't saturated the market so much that you'll see them plastered all over your Instagram feed.

Vibrant accent pieces, upscale designer collaborations

Price-y and made for a very specific kind of shopper

Between $9 and $299 for standard and white glove delivery

RH

Cardin Desk

Jakob Cane Dining Chair

You can shop by room or by decor style on RH (formerly known as Restoration Hardware), a store known for its high-end furnishings beloved by designers and collectors alike. Its extensive selection, plus design consultation services, make furnishing the home of your dreams a rarified, streamlined process.

Elegant furniture, design consultation services available

$299 for local deliveries, $399 for extended deliveries, $599 for national deliveries, $1,699 for deliveries to Alaska or Hawaii

Haworth

Jive Desk with Post Leg, Color Pop Collection

Emeco Broom Stool

Workplace furniture does not have to be boring—far from it. Haworth’s designs come straight from that cool office you saw on Instagram, from desks with colorful peg legs to gaming chairs that aren’t an eyesore (which are extremely hard to find, FWIW).

Helpful for furnishing a home office, vibrant designs available

Limited variety of furniture

Shipping costs vary by product

Jayson Home

Povera Sideboard

Simple Light Antique Bench

Jayson Home specializes in unique and vintage-inspired furniture sourced from around the world. You'll find everything from selenite logs and leather coolers to airy pendants and midcentury burlwood desks with brass detailing. We’re such fans of their Chicago flagship, we named them one of the 83 Best Home Decor Stores in America.

Classic designs, eclectic decor, fun vintage selection

Multiple discounts can’t be applied to an order

What to consider before making an online furniture purchase:

But before you go all in on something, there are a couple of things you’ll want to keep in mind during your search. First up: measure, measure, measure. Testing out furniture IRL is great but not always possible. The last thing you want is to fall in love with something online only to find out it won’t fit through your front door or in the nook it was meant to inhabit. On that note, make sure to measure the package as well—the box will add a couple of inches that you’ll have to account for.

In addition to measuring, consider if you’re going to want this piece of furniture to travel with you from home to home. If you’re working with a larger budget and consider the furniture you’re seeking out to be an investment piece of sorts, you may not want to lean completely into a trending color or texture—such as a hot pink corduroy couch. And we have nothing against hot pink corduroy couches (we love them), but you may not be as into the bold statement in 10 years as you are now. Consider this food for thought.

With two of the biggest considerations out of the way, go forth and seek out that ottoman or couch you’ve been thinking about for years.
